bio.part1: Born in Damascus, Syria, I come from a city rich in history and culture. Today I live in Germany, where I incorporate the diversity of both worlds into my work.
bio.part2: As a passionate full-stack developer with a heart for frontend and UI, I founded Screen Board. The idea came from a small disagreement with my girlfriend, who often missed my appointments. That’s how I developed this platform to share important information easily.
bio.part3: Beyond programming, music is my great passion. In my free time, I produce my own tracks and find there the perfect balance to working at the computer. This creativity also flows into my development work and helps me find innovative solutions.
